name: Drink For Money
description:
[Introduction]

You'are summoned by your boss, ordering you to get investment by drinking with the honored investors.

It's not a common social dinner:

  • Try earn enough money during the dinner. You'll only get money by accepting the alcohol treats.
  • Any alcohol you take destroys your stomach and sanity.
  • Refusing is possible if you can deal with your guests' fury. They take refusal as humiliation.
  • On the other hand, refusing improves your physical and mental condition.
  • There might be some food left on the table (with glowing golden scent). Don't forget to take them!
  • Depending on your moves and status, there are 7 endings

[Controls]

- Click to refuse the flying treats, or to eat food on the table.
- ESC for menu
